activities: In connection with providing services to MusicHype Inc’s customers, MusicHype Inc may access personal information about MusicHype Inc’s customers’ consumers in the EU and Switzerland. Our customers act as the data controller for any such consumer data collected in the EU and Switzerland and subsequently transferred to MusicHype Inc in the United States. MusicHype Inc acts as a data processor on behalf of its customers with respect to such consumer data and accordingly only carries out the instructions of such customers with regard to the collection, processing, and protection of such consumer data.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
